医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
静态等距练习对于降低收缩压和舒张压最有效《英国运动医学杂志》在线发表的一项对临床试验现有证据的汇总数据分析发现，静态等距练习（即无需移动即可调动肌肉的练习，例如靠墙坐和平板支撑）最适合降低血压。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Static-isometric-exercises-most- effective-for-reducing-both-systolic-and-diastolic-blood-Pressure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Static-isometric-exercises-most- effective-for-reducing-both-systolic-and-diastolic-blood-Pressure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e681cd64-7a2d-4a63-90a0-2f2fa0f36994 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 14:01:00 -0400 Static isometric exercises most effective for reducing both systolic and diastolic blood pressure
研究人员发现横纹肌肉瘤的潜在新疗法来自耶拿莱布尼茨衰老研究所和科特布斯-森夫滕贝格勃兰登堡理工大学的研究人员发现了一种治疗软组织肿瘤的新方法，这种肿瘤经常发生在儿童中，并且通常是恶性的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Researchers-discover-pottial-new-treatment-for-rhabdomyosarcoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Researchers-discover-pottial-new-treatment-for-rhabdomyosarcoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e3704431-0090-4972-9adf-3ffefbf396b9 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 13:45:52 -0400 Researchers discover potential new treatment for rhabdomyosarcoma
Epileptika 旨在帮助治疗智力障碍人士的难治性癫痫瓦伦西亚理工大学 (UPV) 的一组研究人员参与了 Epileptika 的开发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Epileptika-aims-to-help-treat-refractory-epilepsy-in-people-with-intellectual-disability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Epileptika-aims-to-help-treat-refractory-epilepsy-in-people-with-intellectual-disability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f623d20-aea8-4d76-b91a-899231fde428 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 13:28:12 -0400 Epileptika aims to help treat refractory epilepsy in people with intellectual disability
研究发现亚洲成年人院外心脏骤停后的生存率存在差距根据今天发表在《美国心脏协会杂志》上的最新研究，尽管院外心脏骤停后旁观者进行心肺复苏的比率相似，但在美国的亚裔成年人的存活率低于白人成年人。 -美国心脏协会杂志的评论。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Study-finds-gap-in-survival-rates-for-Asian-adults-after-out-of-hospital-cardiac-arrest.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Study-finds-gap-in-survival-rates-for-Asian-adults-after-out-of-hospital-cardiac-arrest.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc1c630b-ae91-40a0-84c9-6ac0eb732203 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 12:57:47 -0400 Study finds gap in survival rates for Asian adults after out-of-hospital cardiac arrest
研究人员在对抗粘膜黑色素瘤方面取得突破尽管罕见，但人类粘膜黑色素瘤的存活率较低。由于在动物身上缺乏类似的癌症可供研究，因此调查起来很困难。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Researchers-make-breakthrough-in-fight-against-mucosal-melanoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Researchers-make-breakthrough-in-fight-against-mucosal-melanoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c107bb34-06d2-48c2-aef2-200f2275f066 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 12:52:40 -0400 Researchers make breakthrough in fight against mucosal melanoma
研究强调梅毒自检的优点：方便、隐私和快速得出结果研究人员对梅毒自测（SST）的效用进行了荟萃分析。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Study-highlights-advantages-of-syphilis-self-testing-convenience-privacy-and-rapid-results.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Study-highlights-advantages-of-syphilis-self-testing-convenience-privacy-and-rapid-results.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f09f69b7-fa91-44d1-a490-e0684a837c62 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 11:14:00 -0400 Study highlights advantages of syphilis self-testing: convenience, privacy, and rapid results
研究揭示阻塞性睡眠呼吸暂停与心血管疾病之间的关键机制研究人员发现，患有阻塞性睡眠呼吸暂停的人由于血氧水平降低而增加心血管风险，这在很大程度上是由呼吸中断造成的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Study-reveals-key-mechanism-linking-obstructive-sleep-apnea-and-cardioangio-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Study-reveals-key-mechanism-linking-obstructive-sleep-apnea-and-cardioangio-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4afb472-57f8-470f-ad55-784117440292 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 11:10:00 -0400 Study reveals key mechanism linking obstructive sleep apnea and cardiovascular disease
研究揭示乳腺癌如何扩散到淋巴结淋巴结是人体抵御疾病的第一道防线之一。这些生物警察站派出免疫细胞来击退入侵者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Study-sheds-light-on-how-breast-cancer-spreads-to-lymph-nodes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Study-sheds-light-on-how-breast-cancer-spreads-to-lymph-nodes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e54acf4-d219-4088-9871-5003df61a842 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 11:05:26 -0400 Study sheds light on how breast cancer spreads to lymph nodes
科罗拉多州儿童医院宣布成立精准医学研究所科罗拉多儿童医院（Children's Colorado）今天宣布成立精准医学研究所，这将使专家能够更有效地将精准医学融入到整个医院为患者提供的护理中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Childrens-Colorado-announces-launch-of-the-Precision-Medicine-Institute.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Childrens-Colorado-announces-launch-of-the-Precision-Medicine-Institute.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d210e07d-27eb-456e-a98d-c551455c7c05 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 11:00:00 -0400 Children's Colorado announces launch of the Precision Medicine Institute
MD 安德森和 Nexo Therapeutics 合作，针对以前无法成药的靶点推进新的癌症疗法德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心和 Nexo Therapeutics 今天宣布了一项多年战略合作，该合作将在药物发现和开发的最早阶段协调每个组织的创新技术和能力，以针对以前无法成药的目标快速推进有影响力的新癌症疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/MD-Anderson-and-Nexo-Therapeutics-partner-to-advance-new-cancer-therapies-against-previously-undruggable-targets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/MD-Anderson-and-Nexo-Therapeutics-partner-to-advance-new-cancer-therapies-against-previously-undruggable-targets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49c1e5e6-fa09-4554-a231-15befb276dbf Wed, 26 Jul 2023 10:57:12 -0400 MD Anderson and Nexo Therapeutics partner to advance new cancer therapies against previously undruggable targets
